topup.description: Manage your account balance and redeem codes

online.description: Purchase quota through our external payment system
online.note: You will be redirected to an external payment system. Your account information will be automatically included.
online.text: Click the button below to open our secure payment portal where you can purchase additional quota for your account.
online.title: Online Payment

redeem.description: Enter a redemption code to add quota
redeem.label: Redemption Code
redeem.title: Redeem Code

content: Quota is consumed based on your API usage and model costs
Different models have different pricing rates
Check the Models page to see pricing for each model
Your balance will be automatically updated after successful redemption
tips.title: Tips
